title: Naveed2166
author: Naveed2166
content: I listened about Bitcointalk.org from social media from a video on YouTube but I learned for posting and now I am posting but I don't know that where we will get our earning with posting and how can I see my earning mean that I don't know about earning of posting if I get junior member rank then how can I earn from posting where I can see my earning please help

comments.author: udayantha11
comments.body: Bitcointalk is not for Money earnings. This is for learning and development. Ultimate goal is to financial freedom. Its Longterm one.You can grab plenty of knowledge of whole universe of blockchain , cryptography etcBest of luck

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Welcome, first improve your writing style (at least use punctuation to make it easy for others to understand).Fyi, forums don't pay people to post, so there's no earnings analytics page like youtube. There are several companies campaigning here by hiring active users who contribute well to the forum (good quality posters, according to them). At this time, unfortunately your ranking does not allow using campaign attributes and don't know if you are qualified enough even though the raking is sufficient.

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: Quote from: Naveed2166 on December 07, 2022, 01:40:15 AMI listened about Bitcointalk.org from social media from a video on YouTube but I learned for posting and now I am posting but I don't know that where we will get our earning with posting and how can I see my earning mean that I don't know about earning of posting if I get junior member rank then how can I earn from posting where I can see my earning please help Welcome to the forum Naveed. You may read this thread here: Overview of Bitcointalk Signature-Ad Campaigns [Last update: 04-Dec-22]. Here you'll get all the info about sig. camps paying out in BTC. Visit Bounties (Altcoins) section for joining campaigns paying out in altcoins. Myabe newbies are able to join social campaigns in altcoin section. You atleast need to have a rank of atleast full mem.+ to get accepted in any decent BTC paying  campaign. Read here about ranks: FAQ: Everything you need to know about forum 'activity, account ranks and merit. But before getting greedy about anything such as  post2earn, make sure you learn everything about bitcoin and the forum itself, be a helping hand, engage in all good activities and most importantly have a constructive opinion so that you get all the respect you want.

comments.author: Mr.right85
comments.body: If I get you correctly, how to earn through posting or maybe get or redeem incentives for the posts you've made is qhat your asking for right?If that be it then, your on a very long road to earning even a penny and i can say at this point, your seeking g for the wrong type of help. The help you should be seeking out right now is right here:Quote from: noorman0 on December 07, 2022, 02:20:20 AMWelcome, first improve your writing style (at least use punctuation to make it easy for others to understand).You can't be making posts like you've got there that is not even readable not to talk of comprehension and yet you hope to be appreciated and given incentives for.Earning in the forum is possible but, that's hardly the purpose and you've got a lot way to go. Keep your head down and get into the forum first before being too ambitious.

comments.author: OcTradism
comments.body: You knew about Bitcointalk from Youtube so did you watch those videos?3 newbie welcome videosPost formattingForum feedbackThe first video about post formatting, how to trim quotes is useful to make your posts more enjoying and readers can know wha is a post you reply on and discuss with.Welcome message to new forum members including you. Some guides in that message.

comments.author: Issa56
comments.body: Quote from: Naveed2166 on December 07, 2022, 01:40:15 AMI listened about Bitcointalk.org from social media from a video on YouTube but I learned for posting and now I am posting but I don't know that where we will get our earning with posting and how can I see my earning mean that I don't know about earning of posting if I get junior member rank then how can I earn from posting where I can see my earning please help Welcome to the forum, I will recommend you go through the forum rules first before posting here so that you won't go against the forum rules, because from your post I can see you join the forum just because of the money and not because you want to learn or make impact on the forum, people like you always goes against the forum rules easily because basically what you are after is just merit.You don't get paid just because you are posting on the forum, if you want to be paid then you will have to be in a signature campaign, don't think immediately you create account and you start posting, you will be receiving money. Before you can join a signature campaign you have to rank up first, you need atleast 1 merit with 30 activities to be a junior member, you need atleast 10 merits with 60 activities before you can be a member Rank, you need atleast 100 merits with 120 activities to be a full member, you need atleast 250 merits with 240 activities to be a senior member, you need atleast 500 merits with 480 activities to be a hero member and you need 1000 merits with 775-1030 activities to be a legendary member. I will recommend you go through the link I will be dropping. Newbies - Read before postingIf you want to rank up on the forum, then you should have the mind set to learn or to make impact and not to get merit or make money, if you post for merit sake dont be suprise that you won't really be getting the merit, but if you post freely then definitely you are going to be receiving merit.

comments.author: Ludmilla_rose1995
comments.body: Quote from: Naveed2166 on December 07, 2022, 01:40:15 AMI listened about Bitcointalk.org from social media from a video on YouTube but I learned for posting and now I am posting but I don't know that where we will get our earning with posting and how can I see my earning mean that I don't know about earning of posting if I get junior member rank then how can I earn from posting where I can see my earning please help someone in that youtube video definitely didn't mention in detail how you can make money in this forum. Now let me tell you, it is not easy for you to make money from this forum without years of persistence. even members who have been in this forum for a long time, cannot easily make money from this forum.but you can still work on it by building a good reputation on your account, making quality posts, staying on topic, helping others, don't plagiarize, and staying humble, if you manage to do this, I'm sure not even in half a year, you will be able to make its money from this forum.

comments.author: Razmirraz
comments.body: Quote from: Naveed2166 on December 07, 2022, 01:40:15 AMI listened about Bitcointalk.org from social media from a video on YouTube but I learned for posting and now I am posting but I don't know that where we will get our earning with posting and how can I see my earning mean that I don't know about earning of posting if I get junior member rank then how can I earn from posting where I can see my earning please help What income do you mean?1. MONEY.Forum tidak membayar siapapun pada setiap postingan yang dibuat. Jika anda ingin menghasilkan uang dari forum, anda bisa join di sosmed Campaign atau signature campaign ketika anda sudah promosi ke Jr member.2. MERITYou can post on any board you like, getting Merit is not as easy as imagined and you don't have to beg for it, Merit will come when someone judges your post really deserves it.As a Newbie, you must learn something interesting and master the material to increase your knowledge about forums. One thing you have to throw away from your mind. Don't ever think that Merit is hard to get, because in this forum there are so many contributors who appreciate every quality post. You can also stop here to find out some Forum rules which can be used as a guide to continue to exist here.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Sorry, but if you can't figure out yourself how a small minority of people get to earn money here on Bitcointalk, then you're probably not capable of earning here in the first place.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: A stigma that must be strongly refuted. This forum only gives you a space to exchange information, do business etc. Again it's no commission whatsoever.Regardless of ranking, your post will earnable if it contains any offers of your services or expertise.

comments.author: 8rch7
comments.body: I think have misunderstanding when watching several videos on Youtube channel about how to earn money trough Bitcointalk, I don't think with OP channel Youtube watching priority for promoting Bitcointalk forum or he tries how to get viewer with promising tittle used to make people interested watch their channel. But not closed yet opportunity to earn money trough Bitcointalk forum but you have push up level account rank minimum reaching member and maximum legendary. You can checked with several thread about guide how to earn merit and can push your account level from Newbie become legandary, there will ability to use signature when your account have reaching member and higher the account level have greater income you get from the signature code promotion.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: Op, it seems you're interested in this forum just for the financial benefits and not to exchange ideas and informative discussions, since that's what the platform was created for. But I've got to hand it to you bruv, out of all the newbies who come here seeking for guidance on the workings of this forum, you are one of the few I've seen who is more bothered about the financial gain than anything else on here. Personally, I'd advise you take your mind off what you stand to gain here so you can actively participate and also enjoy the forum.

comments.author: Getmon
comments.body: Starting out here with the sole intention of making money—bad idea. I am aware that the world economy is in a crisis, and many people are looking for online and offline income opportunities. Including banned and inactive accounts, there are more than 3 million members here. Less than 0.01% of accounts are probably earning money. And the earnings vary widely and are insufficient to support a normal life. Start by learning about the forum. Learn about bitcoin by reading topics and discussions. And if you enjoy it, keep involved here and you will soon discover how to make money with cryptocurrencies.

comments.author: Pandu Geddon
comments.body: So what exactly do the videos you watch share? Introducing forums that give you income by posting? it is a big mistake. Forums will never pay you, but companies that advertise on forums with campaigns will pay you.if your goal is to make money. then you should know the forum rules first. after that, you try to increase your ranking. because with your current ranking, no company will pay you.everything you can get in the forum, you just need to search and read it. Welcome to the forum, I hope you get what you are looking for.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Naveed2166 on December 07, 2022, 01:40:15 AMI listened about Bitcointalk.org from social media from a video on YouTube but I learned for posting and now I am posting but I don't know that where we will get our earning with posting and how can I see my earning mean that I don't know about earning of posting if I get junior member rank then how can I earn from posting where I can see my earning please help You should not focus on worrying about your earning and please dont get the impression that being on forum is all about money earning. Newbies should literally dig deeper on whats being done here. Yes there are earning possibilities but its not a sense that your goal is only about that. You should contribute and learn on how to make to become a good member here and hence a bitcointalk user not a bounty hunter.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Are forum videos still being made on YouTube? I remember these viral videos being very popular five or six years ago. And even what OcTradim has shown is from the days of bounty hunting and rampant cheating. But today, OP, you can get some earnings, but you have to work hard for that. With the rank of beginner and the pressure to come here to "make money," you're in for a big disappointment. But I see a few posts about trading; maybe you should try to write on this topic if you have experience.

comments.author: SOKO-DEKE
comments.body: Quote from: Naveed2166 on December 07, 2022, 01:40:15 AMI listened about Bitcointalk.org from social media from a video on YouTube but I learned for posting and now I am posting but I don't know that where we will get our earning with posting and how can I see my earning mean that I don't know about earning of posting if I get junior member rank then how can I earn from posting where I can see my earning please help If your aim of coming to the forum is for earning money you are getting it wrong in one side because that is not what Forum is for. The  existence of forum is for Bitcoin contributions; which mean an individual can come and sake for help if they are having any problem with holding their Bitcoin especially for providing strong security to your Bitcoin,and also to guide newbies. Secondly, if you are  to earn money from Forum here, you need to learn a lot of things first before you can take any step forward that, especially you need to abides by the rules that govern the forum,you must be a good quality poster and earning merit continuously, so that if companies want to make advertisements you can able to get chance to advertise for them. I think that is only way you can earn from here.

comments.author: Ayebabara
comments.body: Quote from: Naveed2166 on December 07, 2022, 01:40:15 AMI listened about Bitcointalk.org from social media from a video on YouTube but I learned for posting and now I am posting but I don't know that where we will get our earning with posting and how can I see my earning mean that I don't know about earning of posting if I get junior member rank then how can I earn from posting where I can see my earning please help That means you here for money not any other thing. Time is coming that the forum will know you really belong if money is the problem to you. Though many users here are for that purpose but hey are hiding it but it is obvious that you expose yourself. If you want to advance in the forum you need to read as I have been doing since almost a week or more. Read more so that some of the questions that will be asked would be gotten through reading.Aye

comments.author: Maestro75
comments.body: Quote from: Edwardard on December 07, 2022, 02:28:07 AMBut before getting greedy about anything such as  post2earn, make sure you learn everything about bitcoin and the forum itself, be a helping hand, engage in all good activities and most importantly have a constructive opinion so that you get all the respect you want.You said it well so he knows this forum does not run like Santa Claus. The earning part of this forum is only an incentive for members who have attained certain rank levels. It is not for fresh members. There is need for rank growth before anybody can start earning. It means Naveed2166 first task is to concentrate on growing his account and not on how to earn eventhough we know that was what brought him to this forum. Get to Member rank first before anything else.
